### swapBBContents() {#a96e05005577b2873e5ef9b3c99c4e30c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void swapBBContents (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB2)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>

<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Dependency matrix before interchange:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">               <a href="#a8799fc92f6ff3fd86b6a60183ddceb5d">printDepMatrix</a>(DependencyMatrix));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the Outermost loop exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LoopNestExit = OuterMostLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#ab48af53a5000ecede46c76dabb4578d2">getExitBlock</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LoopNestExit) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;OuterMostLoop needs an unique exit block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SelecLoopId = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchange/#af36ddc49228f8cf6ea22991daf2b26b0">selectLoopForInterchange</a>(LoopList);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Obtain the loop vector returned from loop cache analysis beforehand,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and put each &lt;Loop, index&gt; pair into a map for constant time query</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// later. Indices in loop vector reprsent the optimal order of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// corresponding loop, e.g., given a loopnest with depth N, index 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indicates the loop should be placed as the outermost loop and index N</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indicates the loop should be placed as the innermost loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the old pass manager CacheCost would be null.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const Loop &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> CostMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchange/#a95eec28fcd78be0ea3050e6e779e6bb4">CC</a> != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;LoopCosts = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchange/#a95eec28fcd78be0ea3050e6e779e6bb4">CC</a>-&gt;getLoopCosts();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; LoopCosts.size(); i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CostMap&#91;LoopCosts&#91;i&#93;.first&#93; = i;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We try to achieve the globally optimal memory access for the loopnest,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and do interchange based on a bubble-sort fasion. We start from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the innermost loop, move it outwards to the best possible position</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and repeat this process.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = SelecLoopId; j &gt; 0; j--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ChangedPerIter = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = SelecLoopId; i &gt; SelecLoopId - j; i--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Interchanged = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchange/#a5342eefdd06826f163b13f40992ce8e4">processLoop</a>(LoopList&#91;i&#93;, LoopList&#91;i - 1&#93;, i, i - 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        DependencyMatrix, CostMap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Interchanged)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loops interchanged, update LoopList accordingly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(LoopList&#91;i - 1&#93;, LoopList&#91;i&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the DependencyMatrix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#a6fdefa5e30cfe78c973990812d4a8900">interChangeDependencies</a>(DependencyMatrix, i, i - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Dependency matrix after interchange:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ChangedPerIter |= Interchanged;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> |= Interchanged;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Early abort if there was no interchange during an entire round of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// moving loops outwards.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ChangedPerIter)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Succ != InnerLoopPreHeader &amp;&amp; Succ != InnerLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a4a75755081e9a3803d2f4ccf6f0cb1f8">getHeader</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also make sure the inner loop preheader does not contain any unsafe</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We currently support LCSSA PHI nodes in the outer loop exit, if their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// incoming values do not come from the outer loop latch or if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outer loop latch has a single predecessor. In that case, the value will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be available if both the inner and outer loop conditions are true, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will still be true after interchanging. If we have multiple predecessor,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that may not be the case, e.g. because the outer loop latch may be executed</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The incoming value is defined in the outer loop latch. Currently we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only support that in case the outer loop latch has a single predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This guarantees that the outer loop latch is executed if and only if</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;OperandVal = SE-&gt;getSCEV(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a>-&gt;getOperand(i));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;AR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVAddRecExpr&gt;</a>(OperandVal);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we find the inner induction after an outer induction e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for(int i=0;i&lt;N;i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   for(int j=0;j&lt;N;j++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     A&#91;i&#93;&#91;j&#93; = A&#91;i-1&#93;&#91;j-1&#93;+k;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then it is a good order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>() == InnerLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found an InnerLoop induction after OuterLoop induction. It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a good order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">            FoundInnerInduction = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FoundOuterInduction) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">              GoodOrder++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we find the outer induction after an inner induction e.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for(int i=0;i&lt;N;i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   for(int j=0;j&lt;N;j++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     A&#91;j&#93;&#91;i&#93; = A&#91;j-1&#93;&#91;i-1&#93;+k;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then it is a bad order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>() == OuterLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found an OuterLoop induction after InnerLoop induction. It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a bad order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">            FoundOuterInduction = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FoundInnerInduction) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">              BadOrder++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GoodOrder - BadOrder;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;bool&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">LoopInterchangeProfitability::isProfitablePerLoopCacheAnalysis(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const Loop &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;CostMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;CacheCost&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the new cost model returned from loop cache analysis.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A smaller index means the loop should be placed an outer loop, and vice</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(InnerLoop) &amp;&amp; CostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(OuterLoop)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;InnerIndex = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; InnerIndex</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InnerIndex &lt; OuterIndex)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(InnerIndex != OuterIndex &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;CostMap should assign unique &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;numbers to each loop&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;bool&gt;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;bool&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">LoopInterchangeProfitability::isProfitablePerInstrOrderCost() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Legacy cost model: this is rough cost estimation algorithm. It counts the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// good and bad order of induction variables in the instruction and allows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reordering if number of bad orders is more than good.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> = getInstrOrderCost();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cost = &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &lt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> &lt; <a href="#a11e75b381a55ab270ad045bf59b466f5">LoopInterchangeCostThreshold</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;bool&gt;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;bool&gt; LoopInterchangeProfitability::isProfitableForVectorization(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InnerLoopId, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OuterLoopId, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loopinterchange-cpp-/#a9d7e577c9daf8c14e73f25a0b2235bd5">CharMatrix</a> &amp;DepMatrix) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Row : DepMatrix) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the inner loop is loop independent or doesn&#39;t carry any dependency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is not profitable to move this to outer position, since we are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// likely able to do inner loop vectorization already.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Row&#91;InnerLoopId&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;I&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || Row&#91;InnerLoopId&#93; == </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;=&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;bool&gt;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the outer loop is not loop independent it is not profitable to move</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this to inner position, since doing so would not enable inner loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// parallelism.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Row&#91;OuterLoopId&#93; != </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;I&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; Row&#91;OuterLoopId&#93; != </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;=&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;bool&gt;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If inner loop has dependence and outer loop is loop independent then it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is/ profitable to interchange to enable inner loop parallelism.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are no dependences, interchanging will not improve anything.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;bool&gt;(!DepMatrix.empty());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchangeprofitability/#a47fea7bb15b60858facd3b9535780d11"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchangeprofitability/#a47fea7bb15b60858facd3b9535780d11">LoopInterchangeProfitability::isProfitable</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;InnerLoop, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;OuterLoop, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InnerLoopId,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OuterLoopId, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loopinterchange-cpp-/#a9d7e577c9daf8c14e73f25a0b2235bd5">CharMatrix</a> &amp;DepMatrix,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const Loop &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;CostMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;CacheCost&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// isProfitable() is structured to avoid endless loop interchange.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If loop cache analysis could decide the profitability then,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profitability check will stop and return the analysis result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If cache analysis failed to analyze the loopnest (e.g.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// due to delinearization issues) then only check whether it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profitable for InstrOrderCost. Likewise, if InstrOrderCost failed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// analysis the profitability then only, isProfitableForVectorization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will decide.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::optional&lt;bool&gt; shouldInterchange =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defined either in the header or latch. Those blocks will become header and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IncIInnerMost-&gt;getParent() != InnerLatch &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the inner loop latch contains LCSSA PHIs, those come from a child loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and we have to move them to the new inner latch.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Deal with LCSSA PHI nodes in the loop nest exit block. For PHIs that have</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopInterchangeTransform::adjustLoopLinks() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
